The four ways of developing immersion fu: Developing immersion further that leads to blissful meditation in the present life
Developing immersion further that leads to gaining knowledge and vision
Developing immersion further that leads to mindfulness and awareness
Developing immersion further that leads to the ending of defilements
The way of developing immersion further: A mendicant, quite secluded from sensual pleasures, secluded from unskillful qualities
Enters and remains in the first absorption
Enters and remains in the second absorption
Enters and remains in the third absorption
Enters and remains in the fourth absorption
A mendicant focuses on the perception of light
Concentrating on the perception of day, regardless of whether it’s night or day
Develops a mind that’s full of radiance
A mendicant knows feelings as they arise, as they remain, and as they go away
Knows perceptions as they arise, as they remain, and as they go away
Knows thoughts as they arise, as they remain, and as they go away
A mendicant meditates observing rise and fall in the five grasping aggregates
Observes form, the origin of form, and the ending of form
Observes feeling, the origin of feeling, and the ending of feeling
Observes perception, the origin of perception, and the ending of perception
Observes choices, the origin of choices, and the ending of choices
Observes consciousness, the origin of consciousness, and the ending of consciousness
